title: Independent Professional and Consultant
about: I am an independent professional who can act as a wildcard for your company when you need a high-level executive to represent you at fairs, business conferences, alliances and business prospecting. With a background as a diplomat, some areas of my strength are: international cooperation, investment attraction, economic relations, public relations and tourism. I speak English and Spanish, basic Portuguese. American and Salvadoran citizenship. Availability to travel immediately.
